system.description:
Lukay is palm leaf art, not dissimilar from origami from the far southern archipelago. Flower seeds, petals, and crushed insects steeped in hot water have been wrapped in a heart-shaped lukay. This, when applied forcibly, envelops The Immortal with a moment of Hiyang, making them one with all things for one moment.

Prereq: Gahum Dampening Ointment

Spend 1 Beat to make an adjacent ally immune to all hits on the next attack against them. However their next attack suffers -2d.

Falling Petal Festival: +1 Beat to affect all allies in burst 1.

Crimson Pepper Blessing: +1 Beat to remove the -2d penalty.
